title: ModuleNotFoundError: No module named 'peachpy.x86_64.avx'
body_html:
[ 72%] Built target onnx
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/lib/python3.6/runpy.py", line 183, in _run_module_as_main
    mod_name, mod_spec, code = _get_module_details(mod_name, _Error)
  File "/usr/lib/python3.6/runpy.py", line 142, in _get_module_details
    return _get_module_details(pkg_main_name, error)
  File "/usr/lib/python3.6/runpy.py", line 109, in _get_module_details
    __import__(pkg_name)
  File "....../peachpy/x86_64/__init__.py", line 25, in <module>
    from peachpy.x86_64.function import Function, LocalVariable
  File "....../peachpy/x86_64/function.py", line 16, in <module>
    import peachpy.x86_64.avx
ModuleNotFoundError: No module named 'peachpy.x86_64.avx'
confu-deps/NNPACK/CMakeFiles/nnpack.dir/build.make:64: recipe for target 'confu-deps/NNPACK/src/x86_64-fma/2d-fourier-8x8.py.o' failed
make[2]: *** [confu-deps/NNPACK/src/x86_64-fma/2d-fourier-8x8.py.o] Error 1

Can anybody just give out a manual, how to successfully build pytorch with caffe2 after caffe2 is integrated into pytorch？

Thank you
